body:
Luv you all. You might see me on once or twice and month rarley never on ts. And to those wondering, after the pay for the build server. Yes it will shutdown.


Good luck in life guys, I wish you the best of luck.

People I need to say bye to:
Merlinmaster- Always has something good to say
Sulorak(Michael)-Always there even when I was mad at him
Hrmmmm. Ahh I got it
lil_greg15-Cool dude
Umm 
All of ts: -A few staff members and players (You know who you are)
MLGtino-Funny guy that needs all your purple markers
(Sorry if your not on this list, there are people that I felt were there for me)
Goodbye.
